about_the_game:
This can only be a story in a parallel world outside the plot of Lady in Tomb. Without the help of her sister and grandfather, 13-year-old Gu Jiuyue had to make a living alone. What can you do without weapons?



The 13-year-old ah Yue's heart is pure and bright. In her eyes, the day when her sister become a Gu Lady will be the happiest time in her life. However, a giant insect leg captured her in an instant. When she opened her eyes again, she was in a cold laboratory.



If... before her sister arrives
This chaotic laboratory, which has been spread all over the Soul Seekers, suddenly gets out of control. Maybe Gu Jiuyue will have a chance to escape from heaven!
Although she has no weapons, the flexible body method she has practiced in the jungle since childhood and the herbal medicine knowledge taught by grandpa are her biggest advantages. Even though her fear made her tremble, it might really be her last chance!



Sister! Grandpa! Help me!!!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD FX™-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700/ AMD Ryzen 2500X or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/ AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 MB available space

short_description: In this DLC, you will control Gu jiuxun's sister Gu Jiuyue and Run for life with her.This DLC will open an experiential plot of "what will happen if ah Yue escapes without waiting for her sister".Two difficulty settings, disable weapons in the whole process!
